profile.name: Wes McKinney
profile.headline: @posit-pbc Senior Software Engineer | Automation & Workflow Optimization Expert
profile.summary: Highly skilled developer with a passion for automation, workflow optimization, and database sharding. Proficient in multiple programming languages, including C++, Rust, Python, and CSS.

experience.title: @posit-pbc Senior Software Engineer | Automation & Workflow Optimization Expert
description: Designed and implemented Roborev, a background agent for reviewing git commits.
Developed and maintained various benchmarking tools for performance optimization.

experience.title: Freelance Developer | Database Sharding Expert
description: Worked on database sharding projects, including the arrow-datafusion repository.
Collaborated with clients to design and implement data processing systems.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer | Rust Enthusiast
description: Maintained multiple open-source projects, including the rust-lang repository.
Contributed to various Rust-related initiatives and discussions.

experience.title: Freelance Developer | Personal Finance Application Specialist
description: Developed personal finance applications using Python and CSS.
Collaborated with clients to design and implement financial data processing systems.
